scripts.android:local: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.local npx react-native run-android --mode=playDebug log-android
scripts.android:dev: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.dev npx react-native run-android --mode=playDebug log-android
scripts.android:stg: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.stg npx react-native run-android --mode=playDebug log-android
scripts.android:prod: cross-env ENVFILE=.env npx react-native run-android --mode=playDebug log-android
scripts.ios-simulator-iphone:local: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.local npx react-native run-ios log-ios --simulator="iPhone 16 Pro"
scripts.ios:local: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.local npx react-native run-ios log-ios
scripts.ios:dev: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.dev npx react-native run-ios log-ios
scripts.ios:stg: cross-env ENVFILE=.env.stg npx react-native run-ios log-ios
scripts.ios:prod: cross-env ENVFILE=.env npx react-native run-ios log-ios
scripts.build:ios-archive: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace heyvoca.xcworkspace -scheme heyvoca -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS -archivePath build/heyvoca.xcarchive archive
scripts.build:ios-ipa: cd ios && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/heyvoca.xcarchive -exportPath build/ipa -exportOptionsPlist exportOptions.plist
